channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Clock Ticks Down Toward Sweeping Tariffs on Canada, Mexico and China

item.title: Drones Now Rule the Battlefield in the Ukraine-Russia War
item.description: Drones have changed the war in Ukraine, with soldiers adapting off-the-shelf models and swarming the front lines.

item.title: Car Prices Are Poised for $12,000 Surge on Trump’s New Tariffs

item.title: At Least One Killed After Car Drives Into Crowd in Germany
item.description: The police in Mannheim, in the country’s southwest, said the driver had been arrested and that they were investigating whether he had acted alone.

item.title: On Mexico’s Once-Packed Border, Few Migrants Remain

item.title: Wall Street is holding its breath as investors wait to see if Trump will enforce new tariffs or pull back at the last minute
item.description: Stocks are coming off a rocky couple of weeks after the market dove sharply on several weaker-than-expected reports on the U.S. economy.

item.title: U.S.A.I.D. Memos Detail Human Costs of Cuts to Foreign Aid
item.description: The world is likely to see millions more malaria infections and 200,000 cases of paralytic polio each year, according to an agency whistle-blower.

item.title: Domino’s Pizza finally launches a stuffed crust competitor—and it’s giving away $250,000 worth of it
item.description: Company spent three years honing its recipe.

item.title: Cuomo’s First Mayoral Campaign Promise: A Plan to Tackle Affordability
item.description: Former Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has jumped into the New York City mayoral race. His first proposal focuses on affordability.

item.title: Wildfires Break Out in North and South Carolina, Prompting Evacuations
item.description: The blazes were fueled by gusty winds, dry air and unusually high temperatures. The largest fire was burning 1,600 acres near Myrtle Beach.
